title: Stalk Me Now
description: When offered a housesitting job at a Malibu mansion, I leap at the chance.A view of the ocean and a quiet place to paint means my last summer before finishing art school might be my best one yet.But things change the moment I arrive.Someone’s watching me.I should be scared.Instead, I’m turned on.Someone is lurking the shadows and it’s making me bold in ways I’ve never been before.Maybe it’s not a creative outlet I need… maybe it’s a sexual one.
author: Frankie Love
